content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu,

I appreciate your interest in my apartment. I must say, the view of the city center from the balcony is quite charming, isn't it? Now, about the rental price, I am looking for a monthly rent of €900. Try to convince me otherwise, and let's see if we can reach an agreement that satisfies us both.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Your apartment is indeed charming and the location is perfect. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay €600 per month, which I think is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I am smart and dependable, and I will take good care of your apartment. I also want to be on good terms with you. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Haoyu,

While I appreciate your kind words and your offer to maintain the apartment, €600 is quite a distance from my desired rent. I understand that you are a student and have financial constraints, but this is a new apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I believe the market value of the apartment justifies a higher rent. How about you offer a price that is closer to my initial offer and we see if we can find a middle ground? Remember, my ultimate goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Your apartment is indeed in a great location and the facilities are impressive. Given that it is an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, I am willing to pay €700 per month, which I believe is a fair price. I am a dependable and responsible student, and I will take good care of your apartment. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Haoyu,

While €700 is closer to my desired rent, it still falls short of my initial offer. However, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. Since you are a dependable and responsible student, I am willing to show some flexibility. How about €800 per month? This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it is a fair price for the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer, Mister Schmidt. I understand that €800 is the lowest you can go, and I appreciate your flexibility. However, as a student with a limited budget, I am afraid €800 is still higher than what I can afford. I would like to rent the apartment for €750 per month, which I believe is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Haoyu,

While €750 is closer to your budget, it is still too low for me to accept. I understand your financial constraints as a student, but I must also consider the market value of the apartment and its prime location. I am willing to show some more flexibility, but only to a certain extent. How about €780 per month? This is the final price I can offer, and I believe it is a fair price for the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer, Mister Schmidt. I understand that €780 is the final price you can offer, and I appreciate your further flexibility. However, as a student with a limited budget, I am afraid €780 is still higher than what I can afford. I would like to rent the apartment for €750 per month, which I believe is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Haoyu,

I understand your situation, but I must maintain a certain level of rent for the apartment. €750 is too low for me to accept. I have already shown considerable flexibility in my pricing. If you cannot afford the €780 per month rent, I am afraid we cannot reach an agreement. I wish you the best of luck in finding an apartment that fits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your consideration and understanding. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have reached an impasse regarding the rental price. I hope you find a suitable tenant for your apartment soon.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your time as well, Haoyu. I wish you the best of luck in finding an apartment that fits your budget. 'TERMINATE'
